name: @mmisty/cypress-grep
description: Filters tests by tags/title using substring or regular expressions (can find dynamic tags)
author: Taisia Pitko (mmisty) <minydas@yandex.ru>

scripts.cy:open:grep: npm run cy:filter && npm run cy -- open --browser chrome --e2e
scripts.cy:open:all: npm run cy:filter && npm run cy -- open --browser chrome --config specPattern='integration/**/all-tests.ts'
scripts.cy:run:grep: export CYPRESS_GREP_RESULTS_FILE='./filtered.json' && npm run cy:filter && npm run cy:run:filtered
scripts.cy:run:filtered: npm run cy -- run --browser chrome --headless --config specPattern='*.*any'
scripts.cy:run:1: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress CYPRESS_GREP_SHOW_TAGS_IN_TITLE=true npm run cy -- run --browser chrome --headless
scripts.cy:run:2: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress CYPRESS_GREP_SHOW_TAGS_IN_TITLE=false npm run cy -- run --browser chrome --headless
scripts.cy:run:3: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress CYPRESS_INTER=true npm run cy -- run --browser chrome --headless --config specPattern='integration/e2e/**/*.cy.ts'
scripts.cy:run:4: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress CYPRESS_GREP='@cyApi&!@navbar' CYPRESS_GREP_SHOW_TAGS_IN_TITLE=true npm run cy:run:grep
scripts.cy:run:5: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress CYPRESS_GREP='@cyApi&!@navbar' CYPRESS_GREP_SHOW_TAGS_IN_TITLE=false npm run cy:run:grep
scripts.cy:run:6: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress CYPRESS_GREP='@cyApi&!@navbar' CYPRESS_GREP_SHOW_TAGS_IN_TITLE=false CYPRESS_GREP_SHOW_EXCLUDED_TESTS=false npm run cy:run:grep
scripts.cy:run:7: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress CYPRESS_GREP_TESTS_FOLDER='integration/e2e' CYPRESS_GREP='@navbar' CYPRESS_GREP_SHOW_TAGS_IN_TITLE=false npm run cy:run:grep
scripts.cy:run:8: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress CYPRESS_GREP_TESTS_FOLDER='integration/e2e' CYPRESS_GREP='@notExisting' npm run cy:run:grep || true
scripts.cy:run:9: CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true COVERAGE_REPORT_DIR=reports/coverage-cypress npm run cy:filter && npm run cy:run:2
scripts.cy:run:cov: npm run cy:run:1 && npm run cy:run:2 && npm run cy:run:3 && npm run cy:run:4 && npm run cy:run:5 && npm run cy:run:6&& npm run cy:run:7&& npm run cy:run:8&& npm run cy:run:9
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:cy && npm run build:tests
scripts.test:all: rm -rf filtered_test_paths.json && npm run test:cov && npm run cy:run:cov
scripts.cov:merge: node ./.scripts/merge.js --cypress reports/coverage-cypress  --jest reports/coverage-jest --out reports/coverage-temp --report reports/coverage-full && npm run cov:fin
scripts.all: npm run pre && npm run cov:check && npm run cov
scripts.pre: rm -rf ./node_modules/.cache lib reports coverage-nyc .nyc_output  && npm run lint && npm run build:all && npm run test:all && npm run cov:merge
scripts.prepublishOnly: rm -rf ./node_modules/.cache lib && npm run build && npm run extract
scripts.try:pack: npm run prepublishOnly && npm pack && npm run postpublish
